text_block_list.text: At long last, starting today the Twinkle Series challenge with Sakura Bakushin O has begun!
She's going to do some amazing things. Because—

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Without further ado, I'll be running the 1200 meters!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Allow me to show you my world-class speed!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushinbakushiii―n!!
She accelerates right from the start, and in the blink of an eye she's gone. It's already a struggle to catch up to her…!
I didn't need to test her ability again. Her weapon of choice is her overwhelming speed. She may well be one of the best in her generation.
I'm sure she'll do great in races, especially in shorter distances where that overwhelming speed is vital!
But—

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Baku… shin…… Baku……
…When she crosses the 1200m mark, she suddenly starts to lose steam. It was supposed to just be a 1200m race to begin with…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Baku… haah, hah……
choice_data_list: Were you just about to run over 1200 meters?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hah… haah…. I was……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: My legs, were in great shape… All was, going well…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: But, I think… the 2400m….also, showed me… what it was made of……

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Haaah… It's… okay. My room for growth, is… in… infi… infini……
The longer the distance, the worse her performance is going to be. After all, sprinting is her specialty.
So it is, but…
After our training session, I was creating a plan of action on how to train her…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san! My apologies that I kept you waiting!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Greetings! Your class president, Sakura Bakushin O, has arrived!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: No matter! Only a superior class president rises to the occasion before she is even beckoned!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: So, I'm here to greet you once again!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yes, naturally! Manners are very important to class presidents.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Firstly, congratulations on receiving the wonderful honor of being my trainer!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'm sure you're very excited about how I'm going to put my overflowing brilliance to use! Yes, yes, I'm certain you are!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'm willing to do everything in my power to Bakushin together with you!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yes, that dream of ours, that dream of unparalleled, earth-shattering, genius wonder and applause—

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: — "The speed to win all G1s"!! In order to achieve this!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I've been making plans A.S.A.P.! Come, come, please take a look!
What she handed me was a neatly written race rotation plan for the year.
choice_data_list: Challenge all the GIs in one year?!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Affirmative! I believe that is roughly 30 races!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: The only way to be a proper class president is to accomplish something that no one has ever done before!
choice_data_list: You can't enter them all in one year.
You can't enter them all in one year.

text_block_list.text: I explained that there are certain times of the year when certain races can be run, and that there are prerequisites to enter…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hm, hmm…… So, the Junior class can only enter G1's such as the Asahi Hai Futurity Stakes, and the Hanshin Juvenile Fillies, et cetera.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: In other words, only the Classic class can aim for the Triple Crown, hm.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Whaaaaaat?!
And with distance aptitudes and scheduling issues, it's a 100% impossible challenge for one girl to win all the G1s. So…
choice_data_list: Why don't you narrow down your target races?
Why don't you narrow down your target races?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Eh? Why do I need to narrow down?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ha! Could it be, you are doubtful of my abilities, Trainer-san?
choice_data_list: No, it's your duty as class president!

text_block_list.text: I told her that it was the duty of the class president to show the other girls a clear path to follow…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Now that you mention it―!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: As class president, it is my solemn duty to make it easier for everyone to run!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Understood, let's narrow down our target races!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: After all, as long as I bear the name of class president, the title of Triple Crown Uma Musume is non-negotiable!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: So, I'll be participating in the Satsuki-sho, Japan Derby, and Kikka-sho!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oh, oh, and we can't forget the Arima Kinen, right? There's no way I can't participate in the race where all the best Umas gather!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: And the Tenno Sho would be good, too! After all, it's a shield! It's perfect for defending the class president's seat!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Oooooh～! My glory as class president has already been decided!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'll be counting on your support for that, Trainer-san!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: You and I have decided on the path that Bakushin ought to take… That is to say, the Bakushin Road!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Starting today, let's put our all into this path! Let us go forth and Bakushin!!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Aaah, I can't wait any longer! I can't wait for the day I pave the way with explosive speed!
There's no doubt, her weapon of choice is her sheer speed. It would be a shame not to take advantage of that talent…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Satsuki Sho, Japan Derby, Kikka Sho, Tenno Sho, and Arima Kinen!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Please wait for me! Because this class president will, without a doubt, head straight for the biggest Bakushin―!!
But, even if I explained the race schedule to her, she wouldn't be convinced. Well, then… I'll just have to guide her well myself!
—I'm in charge of her future, as her Trainer!
And so began the days of running with Sakura Bakushin O towards a grand dream… …Right? I think?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushinbakushiiiin!!
